patterns: what is the suitable saving for children
what are the features of RAN KEKULU
responses: FutureBlooms account can be opened at any WestMinister Bank branch island wide by a parent or a guardian for their children below 18 years.Offer 5%  interest rate.Want Original birth certificate of the child together with a photocopy,NIC of guardian.

patterns: what is the age limit for 18+ saving?
responses: 18+ account can be opened at any WestMinister Bank branch by any Sri Lankan citizen between the age of 18 to 25.Offer 0.5% higher interest rate than the normal savings account.Want NIC and Address proof.

patterns: what is the saving type for middle age one?
How could I open normal saving account?
what is the age range for normal account?
responses: WestMinister Bank Normal Savings Accounts can be opened by any Sri Lankan Citizen above the age of 18 years at any WestMinister Bank branch island wide.Offer 4%  interest rate.Want NIC and Address proof.

patterns: what is the saving type for person above 55?
responses: WestMinister Bank Senior Citizens Account can be opened at any WestMinister Bank Branch island wide by a Sri Lankans over the age of 55 years.Offer 5%  interest rate.Want NIC and Address proof.

patterns: Is there any special saving type for women?
what are the features for LeadingWomen account?
responses: WestMinister Bank LeadingWomen Account can be opened at any WestMinister Bank island wide if you are a woman of 18 years old or above.Offer 0.5% higher interest rate than the normal savings account.Want NIC and address proof.

patterns: I want to know about FD
What is the rate for FD
what are the feature of FD
responses: Sri Lankans over 18 Years of age are eligible to open an FD account.Minimum Deposit Rs. 10,000/.Period ï¿½ 01,03,06 Months and 01 to 05 Years.Rates changeble accoring to government rules and regulations.More info contact 011-XXXXXXX.

patterns: what are the loan type that you have?

responses: we have three type of loans #PERSONAL #LEASING #EDUCATION . what do you want to know about?

patterns: I want a loan for wedding
want to know about housing loan
what is the minimum salary to get personal loan?
responses: Can be applied for any personal need include wedding,making house.Requirement: Government Service receiving a minimum take home salary of Rs. 30,000/,Statutory Bodies/enlisted Companies receiving a take home salary above Rs. 40,000/-.Maximum loan amount is Rs. 10,000,000/.Rate 9.25%.

patterns: can I get lease for car?
can I get lease for unregistered vehicle?
responses: For Vehicles - Both registered and unregistered.Contact our leasing manager 011-XXXXXXX.

patterns: what are the feature of education loan?
what are the eligibility for education loan?
can I apply education loan for forign universities?
responses: Can apply for local & forign universities.Option of paying only the interest until the degree is complete.WestMinister Bank Customers, Students with minimum of 03 passes for G.C.E (A/L) or Students with minimum of 3 passes for G.C.E. (A/L) can apply this loan. you should want Loan Application,Letter from University,Proof of identification (NIC/Passport).
We are open 8am-3pm Monday-friday!
